MemoryInfobox.name: Recovered Relic
MemoryInfobox.description: 'An artist, delighted with her find, planned to offer a beautiful votive figure to the temple priestess. Yet, she feared the Followers of Ares|Followers of Ares and their shrine.'

General_Description: '''Recovered Relic''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: An artist sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. :'''Note'''
''I have an offering to give, but I'm afraid. Please, come see me.'' She sought out the artist and addressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You left a note on the board. What's happened?'' *'''Woman:''' ''Look at this votive figure I found at the market. It's simple, but beautiful. I have not seen its style before.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Is it valuable?'' *'''Woman:''' ''Not in [[drachma]]e, no. But I'm sure the priestess at the temple would appreciate it. So would the [[Followers of Ares|Followers]] of [[Ares]], but they and their dark shrine scare me.'' |-|Kill the Followers of Ares= ("You want all the Followers of Ares killed.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''So you'd like me to wipe out the Followers of Ares.'' *'''Woman:''' ''You understand quickly. I need every last one to die.'' ("You need it delivered.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''And you'll pay me to deliver it to her.'' *'''Woman:''' ''No, all the Followers must die.'' (Accept – "I'll handle it.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm in.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Please be careful.'' *'''Kassandra:''' Chaire. Kassandra left the artist and sought out the Followers of Ares nearby, killing them before she returned to the woman. *'''Woman:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.'' *'''Woman:''' ''The gods favored me the day we met. Take this for your trouble,'' misthios. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Thank you.'' |-|Deliver= *'''Kassandra:''' ''And you'll pay me to deliver it to her.'' *'''Woman:''' ''You understand quickly.'' (Accept - I'll handle it.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''You can count on me.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Exactly. It must arrive without a scratch.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''May the [[Fates]] be on your side.'' Kassandra left the artist and sought out the priestess in a temple nearby, and hailed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''Someone thought you might need this.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Thanks! Here, for your efforts, mercenary.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the artist, and was rewarded for this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes:
The dialogue for timed quests in ''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' is part scripted, part randomly generated from a pool of generic statements. As such, the wording encountered varies.

All timed quests have two variants, as noted: when given a choice, the desired is always the top one.
